property.name: mime.types.file
property.description: Name of file in CLASSPATH containing filename extension and magic sequence to mime types mapping information

property.name: http.timeout
property.description: The default network timeout, in milliseconds.

property.name: parser.character.encoding.default
property.description: The character encoding to fall back to when no other information is available

property.name: io.skip.checksum.errors
property.description: If true, when a checksum error is encountered while reading a sequence file, entries are skipped, instead of throwing an exception.

property.name: crawl.gen.delay
property.description: This value, expressed in days, defines how long we should keep the lock on records in CrawlDb that were just selected for fetching. If these records are not updated in the meantime, the lock is canceled, i.e. the become eligible for selecting. Default value of this is 7 days.
